thread.title: Charles & Elizabeth
thread.title_full: R&G Brenner Income Tax reviewed by Charles & Elizabeth

author: Charles & Elizabeth
title: Charles & Elizabeth
text:
I love RG Brenner's Income Tax Service. We have been with the same CPA, Craig Carter for more than a decade. He does the returns in couple of days upon receipt of documents. Amazing service. He also goes over the deductions with us in depth so we do not miss out on new deductions available.
Craig is also pleasant to work with and most importantly, available to take phone calls even on the weekend!
